name: Google map Direction
author: Mitesh Shah

sections.description:
This is Google Map Direction plugin used to display direction path in map or way for how you can go from source place to destination place.This plugin will display dynamic path and user can view any direction by entering just both source place and destination place value.To display this functionality in your page just write [map-data] shortcode.

Overview

This is Google Map Direction plugin used to display direction path in map or way for how you can go from source place to destination place.
sections.installation:
1. Upload google map direction plugin to your plugin directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [map-data] in post/page of your template
